name: 迪伦·布洛尔
introduction: Dylan is a Scottish actor, originally from rural Dumfries and Galloway. He is known for his work on Irvine Welsh's Crime (2022), Shetland (2023), and Empire of Light (2023). He can be seen as co-lead alongside Mark Bonnar in Calamity James (2023), a live action Beano Comics adaptation produced by Emanata Studios for BBC iPlayer. Dylan is represented by Dan Albert at DPA Management.
